meanings.definition: A colorless or slightly yellow, transparent, brittle protein formed by boiling the specially prepared skin, bones, and connective tissue of animals and used in foods, drugs, and photographic materials.
meanings.sent1: The gelatine in the soup gave it a smooth texture.
meanings.sent2: I used gelatine to make a delicious jelly dessert.
meanings.sent3: The gelatine decided to join the party and added some bounce to the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as firm as gelatine, unyielding to any doubts.
meanings.sent5: The gelatine shimmered under the sunlight, resembling a fragile crystal.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from gelatine, especially a sweet, flavored dessert.
meanings.sent1: The store sells various gelatine desserts in colorful packages.
meanings.sent2: My favorite treat is a bowl of fruity gelatine.
meanings.sent3: The gelatine dessert wiggled on the plate, teasing my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of gelatine sweetness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they slurped the wobbly gelatine dessert.
